participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative and driven, with a passion for learning and self-discovery.
participant_1.background: I like to use my creativity to make unique and interesting items from thrift shop finds. I start my senior year of high school next week. I think it's really cool to be able to build things with your own hands. I want to be a doctor when I graduate. I'm learning a lot about myself through my studies and my experiences in the water.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Relaxed and introspective, with a love for nature and creativity.
participant_2.background: I would like to be reincarnated as a cat so I can sleep all day and eat sushi whenever I want. I start my day with a cup of coffee and a bit of gardening, which helps to calm me down before I start my day. I have a strange obsession with pens. I keep my body and mind active through yoga and meditation. I sometimes miss my friends because I have a pet iguana that takes up a lot of my time.

content.text: I'm excited to start my senior year of high school next week! I'm looking forward to taking some challenging classes and getting involved in more extracurricular activities.
That's exciting! I'm starting my freshman year of college next week. I'm nervous but also excited to meet new people and learn new things.
What are you studying in college?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about majoring in environmental science or biology.
Those are both great choices! I'm interested in environmental science too. I'm planning on going to medical school after I graduate from high school.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be a great doctor.
What are some of your hobbies?
I love to make unique and interesting items from thrift shop finds. I also like to go swimming and scuba diving.
That's cool! I love to garden and I also have a strange obsession with pens.
That's funny, I have a strange obsession with coffee!
